actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the acquisition by certain corporations of their own stock or that of an affiliate as a distribution of property to the corporation's remaining shareholders.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that when a publicly-traded corporation purchases its own stock, or the stock of an affiliate, the purchase shall be taxed as a distribution of property to the shareholders of the corporation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the acquisition by certain corporations of their own stock or that of an affiliate as a distribution of property to the corporation's remaining shareholders.
